name: Eco-Racer (LD41)
description:
You're an amateur race car driver. Utilizing the latest in green technologies, you've decided to take on the time trials in your advanced bio-fuel powered car.

made in ~40 hours for the #LudumDare game jam

(while playable in the browser, a better experience would be had from downloading the desktop version)

controls:
wasd   =   move/drive/steer
space  =   plant seed/pick plant/place plant in car/get in car/get out of car
shift  =   water plants (when not in car)

this game also supports gamepad controls

joystick      =  move/drive/steer
button 0 (A)  =  plant seed/pick plant/place plant in car/get in car/get out of car
button 1 (B)  =  water plants (when not in car)

game programmed in Unity, audio made by BFXR, music made with BeepBox
